title: Incisive Great Teacher
overview: Liu Ao Tian is set to become a Wushu (martial arts) instructor, hence he is sent to Hong Wen academy where he is also to make sure the emperor's new edict to allow female students is being enforced. However along the way, he makes a mistake in a marriage seeking battle that has been set up by Lu Yu Fei. As a result, she chases him all the way to Hong Wenacademy, where she eventually also becomes a teacher. As their bickering romance begins to blossom, a third love interest, makes an appearance, making things difficult for the two. To add more to their difficulties, Yu Fei accidentally starts a fire at the school, which leads to several questions about Ao Tian's actual motives.
